what do you want to know?
did you get the mach stuff as kernel-patch?
do you have a set of kernel-sources?
have you a symlink from /usr/src/linux pointing to /usr/src/kernel-source-xxx?
you need a .config file in your kernel sources. Easiest is to fetch the config file from the /boot/grub dir, and copy to your linux-sources as .config
